text:
In both the default source and binary downloads, exe files generate the [Mon 
Jul 26 16:47:11 2004] [error] [client 192.168.0.2] Premature end of script 
headers: d:/apps/apache/apache1_3/apache/cgi-bin/hellodr.exe
[Mon Jul 26 16:50:48 2004] [error] [client 192.168.0.2] Premature end of 
script headers: d:/apps/apache/apache1_3/apache/cgi-bin/hellodr.cgi
in the error logs. The scripts are fine and run unchanged on Microsoft's IIS 
as well as a previous apache release that I deleted before downloaded this one.
creator: info@infoshard.com

text:
Under XP, the apache server runs them fine when running as a console app. The 
same script run when apache is a NT service fails to run the script, yeilding 
the [Mon Jul 26 17:21:33 2004] [error] [client 192.168.0.2] Premature end of 
script headers: d:/apps/apache/apache1_3/apache/cgi-bin/hellodr.cgi in the 
error log.
creator: info@infoshard.com
